title: Magic Chef of Ice and Fire - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manhua   Artifacts   Chefs   Cooking   Cultivation   Fat Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Magic   Magic Formations   Male Protagonist   Orphans   Polygamy   Romantic Subplot   Skill Creation   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Weak to Strong
author: Tang Jia San Shao   唐家三少
description: His mother kidnapped by the Ice God Pagoda at a young age, Nian Bing grew up travelling with his father, avoiding pursuit. One fateful day, he was forever separated from both his parents and inherited two immortal treasures from them, the Ice and Snow Goddess’ Stone and the Flame God’s stone, allowing him to use ice and fire magic in harmony, a feat unheard of. Taken in by a former chef of legends, once known as the Demon Chef, he creates legendary cuisine while walking the path of vengeance!>
